summary: This is a new weapon granted to you by Sheogorath.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome everyone to my very first mod!


I am not yet an experienced modder so don\'t expect much.
The Chaos Thing is a weapon that I based off of the madman himself, Sheogorath.
You can find it in Pelagius\' mind. It should be on the ground next to the table.

Weight: 31
Damage: 41
Value: 5289 gold
Has a high power fear spell.

Please inform me of any bugs or improvements for the mod.

I am planning on adding more items for the gods. I will include ones such as Talos and Mara. I will also include a quest for each as I learn more about the CK.

Credit to Enoomnai for the improved texture.
author: Fanseerd
